Name: Confessions
About the game: Write or Read Write down what burdens you and send it into the aether. Read confessions by other people. That's it! You will not be able to answer or react to any confessions you read and such a feature will never be implemented. All confessions are as anonymous as you want them to be. Confessions is an interactive art installation and contains no gameplay .
